effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 20 [HP]{mechanic:hp}.

flavor_text_entries.text:
きのみ　１００％の　ジュース。
ポケモン　１匹の　ＨＰを
２０だけ　回復する。

A 100 percent pure juice made of Berries.
When consumed, it restores
20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Bevanda di puro succo di bacche.
Restituisce 20 PS a un Pokémon.

Zumo de bayas 100% natural que restaura 20 PS
de un Pokémon.

Hundertprozentiger Fruchtsaft, aus Beeren
gekeltert. Füllt die KP eines Pokémon
um 20 KP auf.

Une boisson 100 % pur Jus de Baie.
Restaure 20 PV d’un Pokémon.

きのみ　１００％の　ジュース。
ポケモン　１ひきの　ＨＰを
２０だけ　かいふくする。

A 100% pure juice made of Berries.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

A 100% pure juice made of Berries.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

Une boisson 100% pur jus de Baies.
Restaure 20 PV à un Pokémon.

A 100% pure juice made of Berries.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

A 100% pure juice made of Berries.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

A 100% pure juice made of Berries.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
just 20 points.

A 100% pure juice.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 20 points.

A 100% pure juice
that restores HP
by 20 points.
